body.name: HOPEMATE Retinol Cream, Anti-Aging Moisturizer Cream 2.5% for Face and Eye Care, Anti-Wrinkle Essence with Hyaluronic Acid, Vitamin E and Green Tea, Day and Night Cream, 1.7 Fl.Oz, 50ml
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 19 hrs 29 mins
features: Our anti-aging facial moisturizer can help reduce wrinkles,fine lines and age spots and prevent keratinization of skin. It works for various skin types and is suitable for men and women.

This retinol cream restores the skin's moisture. The unique ingredients of Hyaluronic Acid and Vitamin E quickly restore the vitality of the skin and keep it healthy. In addition, aloe and green tea ingredients are effective at preventing sun damage, wrinkles and dry skin.
Ingredients of our face cream are natural and safe. Organic plant extract, no chemical c

The moisturizer cream is good for day and night use. Its quick absorption can help eliminate dead skin,strengthen the antioxidant capacity of our body, reduce the damage caused by free radicals and delay aging skin.
After-sales: If you have any comments on our face moisturizer, please contact us and we will be at your service soon. Let us do the best for you and provide you a brighter looking!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: HOPEMATE Retinol Cream to the best protected anti-aging secrets Why HOPEMATE Retinol Moisturizer? It is light yet rich and can quickly be absorbed by your skin. It accelerates the metabolism of the stratum corneum, offers antioxidants and freshness to your face. Make your skin softer and smoother and you look younger. It repairs damaged cells, hydrates and moisturizes skin. Keep your skin clean and supple. It regulates the oil secretion of your skin and prevent the formation of acne. Its powerful ingredients: Retinol, Vitamin E, Vitamin B5, Green Tea, Jojoba Oil and more can make a difference in your skin if you keep using it! When HOPEMATE Retinol Cream? It can be used in the daytime and at night. Use it regularly and you can get an unexpected result! Who HOPEMATE? HOPEMATE is continuously working on improving ladies' beauty and building up their confidence! We hold a belief that age is not a limit, a shortcoming or an excuse! We say NO to any appearance discriminations. Ladies can keep their youth, vigor and beauty all their life! HOPEMATE is here to help and work with them! ***

Regulates keratin metabolism, anti-aging, wrinkles Reduces sebum and leaves skin elastic, while diminishing spots and softening skin Vitamin D and protein, high stability, great extensibility Excellent permeability to “lock” moisture, prevent wrinkles Replenish loss of Ologopeptide-1 Activate factor of skin renewal

HOPEMATE 24K Gold Under Eye Masks HOPEMATE Retinol Moisturizer Cream HOPEMATE Electric Makeup Brush Cleaner HOPEMATE Makeup Brush Cleaner Solution HOPEMATE Makeup Sponge FEATURE Anti-Aging, Anti-Wrinkle Anti-Aging, Anti-Wrinkle Cleaning and dry makeup brush within 20 seconds Anti-Aging, Anti-Wrinkle Anti-Aging, Anti-Wrinkle

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 24, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Creamy and not greasy
reviews.reviewText: Has this changed the overall appearance of my face like some sort of miracle? No, it hasn’t, but it has given me an extra boost of moisture and has helped even the appearance of my dry skin. This doesn’t have any heavy perfumes or smells at all which is really good. I can’t stand fragranced lotions. This hardly has any smell at all which is great. It is thick and not greasy at all. I originally purchased this to apply to my chest and neck, but it feels so great I decided to use it on my face as well. It’s not to thick and I can wear it before bed or under my makeup. I am very pleased with the product and I look forward to the long term benefits because the short term have been great already.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gread deal for the $$$
reviews.reviewText: Great product for the price. Highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Te deja la cara bien nice

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 11, 2021
reviews.reviewText: This is my favorite retinol face cream I have ever used. I have tried several different brands. I have extremely dry skin, and within the first week of once daily use, my skin is so soft. It is a heavy, silky cream that I use before bed. I’m very happy I found this. I will keep using it as long as I can get it if they don’t change the formula. If your looking for a great Retinol night cream this is it. No redness or peeling skin at all.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 6, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Try if you have the $$$
reviews.reviewText: I have been using this for a couple months pretty consistently now. I still really enjoy it. I was using another cream off and on, but have abandoned that one for this. I have dryer cheeks and an oily tzone. It works well for both areas. I feel comfortable putting it on my under eyes since it's a very light formula but hydrating. I LOVE the pump. I press it and get a perfect amount of cream for my face and neck. Had my mom who is turning 60 this year try it and she said she preferred it to what she was using. Some people mentioned a smell, I don't really think it has a strong one, or at least I've never commented on it.Edit: They changed the packaging and doubled the price.... Yuck.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So far, so good!
reviews.reviewText: I’ve only been using this product for one week, but I have been applying it daily and so far I like the results. My skin has been looking nice, moisturized and even-toned. I have not broken out at all, either, which is always a concern for me as I have sensitive skin. Update: I have been using this for weeks/months now and still love it. As a matter fact, I went on a short vacation and did not bring it with me and noticed a vast difference in my skin - I couldn’t wait to get back to it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Remove pump's nozzle end clip to use and all is well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Made fine lines worse
reviews.reviewText: I used this for a week and had to stop because it appeared to make my fine lines even worse? It felt good on my face but I had to stop using it because it did the opposite of help with wrinkles.
